{"code":1,"isDone":false,"toInsertArticleList":[{"createdTime":"2020-08-31 14:00:50","updatedTime":"2020-08-31 14:00:50","title":"The top 9 shows on Netflix this week, from 'Lucifer' to 'High Score'","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/top-tv-shows-on-netflix-this-week-lucifer-high-score-2020-8","description":"<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5cc9f689021b4c3c75487405?format=jpeg\" alt=\"lucifer\" height=\"914\" width=\"1718\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>&#34;Lucifer&#34;\n<p class=\"copyright\">Netflix</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><ul class=\"summary-list\"><li>Netflix's \"Lucifer\" dethroned \"The Umbrella Academy\" this week as the streamer's most popular show.</li><li>Netflix introduced daily top lists of the most popular titles on the streaming service in February.</li><li>Streaming search engine&#160;<a href=\"https://reelgood.com/\" data-analytics-module=\"summary_bullets\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"0\" data-uri=\"f31f5072d3c303e73f0408b12527e204\">Reelgood</a>&#160;keeps track of the lists and provides Business Insider with a rundown of the week's most popular TV shows on Netflix.</li><li><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/?hprecirc-bullet\" data-analytics-module=\"summary_bullets\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"0\" data-uri=\"f0e80ded5d35b2778c5da3bdda2e6898\">Visit Business Insider's homepage for more stories</a>.</li></ul><p>After a few weeks at the top, Netflix's \"Umbrella Academy\" was dethroned as the streamer's most popular TV series by \"Lucifer.\" The first half of the show's fifth season debuted last week.</p><p>Netflix introduced daily top 10 lists of its most viewed movies and TV shows in February (it counts a view if an account watches at least two minutes of a title).</p><p>Every week,&#160;<a href=\"https://reelgood.com/\" data-analytics-module=\"body_link\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"20\" data-uri=\"f31f5072d3c303e73f0408b12527e204\">the streaming search engine Reelgood</a>&#160;compiles for Business Insider a list of which TV shows have been most prominent on Netflix's daily lists that week.&#160;</p><p>Netflix's latest reality series, \"Million Dollar Beach House,\" also gained popularity this week.</p><p>Producer Nick Rigg <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/netflixs-million-dollar-beach-house-producers-on-making-the-show-2020-8\">told Business Insider's Ashley Rodriguez</a> in an interview&#160;that Netflix was a \"natural home\" for the show because it's \"somewhat of a hybrid model of a show &#8212; it's not all a docu-soap and it's not all a heavily formatted show &#8212; it's somewhere between the two.\"</p><p>\"The Legend of Korra\" was the only show that's not a Netflix original on this week's list.&#160;</p><section data-slideshow-intro-content=\"\"><section data-slideshow-intro-content=\"\"><section data-slideshow-intro-content=\"\"><section data-slideshow-intro-content=\"\"><section data-slideshow-intro-content=\"\"><section data-slideshow-intro-content=\"\"><section data-slideshow-intro-content=\"\"><p><strong>Below are Netflix's 9 most popular TV shows of the week in the US:</strong></p></section></section></section></section></section></section></section>\n<div id=\"slideshow\">\n\t9. \"Million Dollar Beach House\" (Netflix original, 2020-present)\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f495a087ffa48002894cf39?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Million Dollar Beach House Netflix\" height=\"2400\" width=\"3200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>A still from Netflix&#39;s &#34;Million Dollar Beach House.&#34;\n<p class=\"copyright\">Netflix</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p><a href=\"https://www.netflix.com/title/81108694\"><strong>Description</strong></a>: \"The competition is fierce &#8212; and the drama undeniable &#8212; as a group of young and hungry agents try to seal the deal on luxury listings in the Hamptons.\"</p><p><strong>Rotten Tomatoes critic score</strong>: N/A</p><p><strong>What critics said</strong>: \"Naturally, if viewers are not quite satisfied luxuriating in the dream homes of other people, they can be marinating in the bile generated by those selling the dream homes of other people.\" &#8212; <a href=\"https://www.wsj.com/articles/million-dollar-beach-house-review-no-good-deed-goes-unsigned-11598383997\">Wall Street Journal</a> (season 1)</p>\n\t8. \"Trinkets\" (Netflix original, 2019-2020)\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f2307bd7924a1720029a57b?format=jpeg\" alt=\"trinkets netflix\" height=\"1100\" width=\"1732\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Netflix</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p><a href=\"https://www.netflix.com/title/80230561\"><strong>Description</strong></a>: \"A grieving teen finds an unexpected connection with two classmates at her new high school after they all land in the same Shoplifters Anonymous group.\"</p><p><strong>Rotten Tomatoes critic score</strong>: 50%</p><p><strong>What critics said</strong>: \"Trinkets satisfies in its final season by switching to a character-driven focus that lets its main trio have the final word on how we view them, and how they view themselves.\" &#8212; <a href=\"https://www.rogerebert.com/streaming/netflixs-trinkets-wraps-with-a-surprisingly-poignant-second-season\">RogerEbert.com</a> (season 2)</p>\n\t7. \"Teenage Bounty Hunters\" (Netflix original, 2020-present)\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f3ee87b89aff80028ab7023?format=jpeg\" alt=\"teenage bounty hunters\" height=\"1278\" width=\"2050\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>&#34;Teenage Bounty Hunters&#34;\n<p class=\"copyright\">Netflix</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p><strong>Description</strong>: \"Twin sisters Sterling and Blair balance teen life at an elite Southern high school with an unlikely new career as butt-kicking bounty hunters.\"</p><p><strong>Rotten Tomatoes critic score</strong>: 91%</p><p><strong>What critics said</strong>: \"'Teenage Bounty Hunters' is not perfect television, but it's infused with the sort of small-scale, needle-sharp sensibility that can't be achieved by committee, nor, really, by anyone fearful of falling flat.\" &#8212; <a href=\"https://variety.com/2020/tv/columns/teenage-bounty-hunters-netflix-1234740296/\">Variety</a> (season 1)</p>\n\t6. \"Rust Valley Restorers\" (Netflix original, 2018-present)\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f495c4a7ffa48002894cf48?format=jpeg\" alt=\"rust valley restorers\" height=\"1047\" width=\"1397\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Netflix</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p><a href=\"https://www.netflix.com/title/80203254?source=35\"><strong>Description</strong></a>: \"Old-school auto collector Mike Hall, his pal Avery Shoaf and son Connor Hall go the extra mile to restore retro cars &#8212; and hopefully turn a profit.\"</p><p><strong>Rotten Tomatoes critic score</strong>: N/A</p><p><strong>What critics said</strong>: N/A</p>\n\t5. \"High Score\" (Netflix original, 2020)\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f495e387ffa48002894cf4e?format=jpeg\" alt=\"high score netflix\" height=\"1292\" width=\"2234\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Netflix</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p><a href=\"https://www.netflix.com/title/81019087\"><strong>Description</strong></a>: \"This docuseries traces the history of classic video games, featuring insights from the innovators who brought these worlds and characters to life.\"</p><p><strong>Rotten Tomatoes critic score</strong>: 74%</p><p><strong>What critics said</strong>: \"High Score presents video games as a great equalizer ... It does not have any interest in exploring the gatekeepers, inside and out of the industry, who have made this vision as simplistic as it is wrong.\" &#8212; <a href=\"https://www.theverge.com/21400844/high-score-netflix-review-video-games\">The Verge&#160;</a></p>\n\t4. \"The Legend of Korra\" (Nickelodeon, 2012-2014)\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5ebf0f0f988ee320be2f2743?format=jpeg\" alt=\"the legend of korra series premiere\" height=\"1080\" width=\"1920\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>&#34;The Legend of Korra&#34; takes place 70 years after the events of &#34;Avatar: The Last Airbender.&#34;\n<p class=\"copyright\">Nickelodeon</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p><a href=\"https://www.netflix.com/title/80027563?source=35\" data-analytics-module=\"body_link\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"80\" data-uri=\"b7aad5744f720d752ad5cd4308a490f6\"><strong>Description</strong></a>: \"An avatar who can control the elements fights to keep her city safe from the evil forces of both the physical and spiritual worlds.\"</p><p><strong>Rotten Tomatoes critic score</strong>: 93%</p><p><strong>What critics said</strong>: \"In a cultural climate that is starving for strong female representation The Legend Of Korra has consistently delivered captivating female figures.\" &#8212; <a href=\"https://tv.avclub.com/the-legend-of-korra-day-of-the-colossus-the-last-st-1798182260\">AV Club</a> (season 4)</p>\n\t3. \"Hoops\" (Netflix original, 2020-present)\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f495fbe7ffa48002894cf5b?format=jpeg\" alt=\"hoops netflix\" height=\"1284\" width=\"2240\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Netflix</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p><strong><a href=\"https://www.netflix.com/title/81008138\">Description</a>:</strong> \"A foul-mouthed high school basketball coach is sure he'll hit the big leagues if he can only turn his terrible team around. Good luck with that.\"</p><p><strong>Rotten Tomatoes critic score</strong>: 15%</p><p><strong>What critics said</strong>: \"If Hoops had the courage of its lack of convictions it would be as overtly racist and homophobic as it is sexist. But it doesn't. It confirms its racism and homophobia through tokenism.\" &#8212; <a href=\"https://www.theguardian.com/tv-and-radio/2020/aug/21/hoops-review-netflix-cartoon\">Guardian</a> (season 1)</p>\n\t2. \"The Umbrella Academy\" (Netflix original, 2019-present)\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f286b03191824457d45178d?format=jpeg\" alt=\"the umbrella academy luther hargreeves 205\" height=\"1310\" width=\"2000\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Tom Hopper on season two, episode five of &#34;The Umbrella Academy.&#34;\n<p class=\"copyright\">Christos Kalohoridis/Netflix</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p><a href=\"https://www.netflix.com/title/80186863\" data-analytics-module=\"body_link\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"100\" data-uri=\"e53cd33d75b63232840e2aac7b43b2bd\"><strong>Description</strong></a>: \"Reunited by their father's death, estranged siblings with extraordinary powers uncover shocking family secrets &#8212; and a looming threat to humanity.\"</p><p><strong>Rotten Tomatoes critic score</strong>: 82%</p><p><strong>What critics said</strong>: \"What makes the second season of \"The Umbrella Academy\" such pleasant viewing is all the ways it lives up to the promise of the flawed-but-very-watchable first year.\" &#8212; <a href=\"https://datebook.sfchronicle.com/movies-tv/review-umbrella-academy-returns-with-same-eccentric-cast-for-a-new-season-of-twists-and-turns\">San Francisco Chronicle</a> (season 2)</p>\n\t1. \"Lucifer\" (Netflix original, 2016-present)\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5dbb2c20311d60080f3eaec2?format=jpeg\" alt=\"lucifer netflix\" height=\"2000\" width=\"3000\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">John P. Fleenor/Netflix</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p><strong><a href=\"https://www.netflix.com/title/80057918?source=35\" data-analytics-module=\"body_link\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"20\" data-uri=\"7a278175c99adbc8b51962b41acbde87\">Description</a>:</strong>&#160;\"Bored with being the Lord of Hell, the devil relocates to Los Angeles, where he opens a nightclub and forms a connection with a homicide detective.\"</p><p><strong>Rotten Tomatoes critic score: </strong>86%</p><p><strong>What critics said:</strong> \"Lucifer will always be the show that gave us an archangel chasing a chicken while the Devil laughs in the background and Season 5 is going all-in on the parts of the show that make it such an addictive watch.\" &#8212; <a href=\"https://www.tvguide.com/news/lucifer-season-5-part-1-review-netflix/\">TV Guide</a> (season 5)</p>\n</div><div class=\"read-original\">Read the original article on <a 020_2/2020/08/31/06-00-57-877_99a57cc2511f53cd.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/typepad/alleyinsider/silicon_alley_insider?d=bcOpcFrp8Mo":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx10/cdn53@2020_2/2020/08/31/06-00-56-954_403f715e664a4d00.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/typepad/alleyinsider/silicon_alley_insider?i=GfygYlPYNHA:1ruQNo_sOAs:gIN9vFwOqvQ":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx2/cdn46@2020_5/2020/08/31/06-00-57-763_ba3cdf4788ed6c91.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/typepad/alleyinsider/silicon_alley_insider?d=cGdyc7Q-1BI":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx29/cdn70@2020_3/2020/08/31/06-01-02-412_be4dce30169e75ab.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/typepad/alleyinsider/silicon_alley_insider?d=QXVau8BzmBE":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx5oss/cdn2@2020_6/2020/08/31/06-01-03-283_c4d57f9dd1ff11a2.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/typepad/alleyinsider/silicon_alley_insider?d=yIl2AUoC8zA":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx/cdn46@2020_1/2020/08/31/06-01-03-681_0165ab2292566722.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/typepad/alleyinsider/silicon_alley_insider?d=7Q72WNTAKBA":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx12/cdn18@2020_6/2020/08/31/06-00-58-166_b28aa1f69f1eb446.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/typepad/alleyinsider/silicon_alley_insider/~4/GfygYlPYNHA":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx22/cdn85@2020_3/2020/08/31/06-00-55-840_f84be7797cd6dd2c.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598853650328},{"createdTime":"2020-08-31 14:00:50","updatedTime":"2020-08-31 14:00:50","title":"Michael Moore warned that Trump's support among his base is 'off the charts', and he is on course to win the presidential election","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/michael-moore-trump-on-course-for-win-in-presidential-election-2020-8","description":"<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f4b6dd960bf1f002807961a?format=jpeg\" alt=\"trump michael moore\" height=\"1000\" width=\"2000\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Drew Angerer/Getty Images, Santiago Felipe/Getty Images</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><ul class=\"summary-list\"><li>Filmmaker Michael Moore has warned that history may be repeating itself, and as in 2016 complacent progressives are ignoring the huge and fervent support President Trump has in battleground states.&#160;</li><li>\"I'm warning you almost 10 weeks in advance. The enthusiasm level for the 60 million in Trump's base is OFF THE CHARTS! For Joe, not so much,\" wrote Moore on Facebook.&#160;</li><li>Moore cited a series of polls showing Biden and Trump tied, or the race narrowing, in swing states that helped propel Trump to a shock victory in 2016.&#160;</li><li>Moore, a supporter of Bernie Sanders' presidential campaign, was one of few to predict that \"Rust Belt\" voters would abandon Democrats and propel Trump to victory in 2016.&#160;</li><li><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/?hprecirc-bullet\">Visit Business Insider's homepage for more stories</a>.</li></ul><p>Filmmaker Michael Moore has warned that enthusiasm for President Donald Trump is \"off the charts\" in key battleground states, and complacent Democrats risk the same shock they suffered in the 2016 election when many wrote off Trump's chances.&#160;</p><p>Moore, who comes from Flint, Michigan, has spent his career documenting the plight of working-class Americans in the \"Rust Belt,\" whose decision to flip from Democrat to Republican was key to Trump's shock victory four years ago.</p><p>He was one of few political observers to successfully predict in 2016 that Trump would defeat Hillary Clinton, as Trump's America First message resonated in states where traditional industries have been decimated.&#160;</p><p><a href=\"https://www.facebook.com/mmflint\">In a Facebook post on Saturday</a>, he warned progressives against complacency as national polls continue to show Democratic candidate Joe Biden with a lead over Trump.&#160;</p><p>\"Are you ready for a Trump victory? Are you mentally prepared to be outsmarted by Trump again? Do you find comfort in your certainty that there is no way Trump can win? Are you content with the trust you've placed in the DNC to pull this off?\" he wrote.&#160;</p><p>\"I'm warning you almost 10 weeks in advance. The enthusiasm level for the 60 million in Trump's base is OFF THE CHARTS! For Joe, not so much,\" warned Moore. \"Don't leave it to the Democrats to get rid of Trump. YOU have to get rid of Trump. WE have to wake up every day for the next 67 days and make sure each of us are going to get a hundred people out to vote. ACT NOW!\" wrote Moore.&#160;</p><p>He went on to claim that recent polling shows the race tightening in swing states.&#160;</p><p>In the post, Moore claimed that \"when CNN polled registered voters in August in just the swing states, Biden and Trump were in a virtual tie.\"</p><p><a href=\"https://edition.cnn.com/2020/08/16/politics/cnn-poll-biden-trump-august/index.html\">The August 17 CNN poll taken ahead of the party conventions</a> found that of registered voters in battleground states, 49% backed Biden and 48% Trump.</p><p>\"In Minnesota, it's 47-47. In Michigan, where Biden had a big lead, Trump has closed the gap to 4 points,\" continued Moore.&#160;</p><p>In a poll on <a href=\"https://twitter.com/MattMackowiak/status/1296520490635362307?s=20\">August 20, the GOP-leaning Trafalgar Group found Biden and Trump tied </a>at 47% in Minnesota, while an <a href=\"https://news.wisc.edu/battleground-state-poll-shows-biden-leading-trump-in-michigan-pennsylvania-and-wisconsin/\">August 20 poll by the University of Wisconsin-Madison</a> found Biden with a five-point lead over Trump in Michigan.</p><p>The most recent battleground state poll, released by <a href=\"https://changeresearch.com/post/states-of-play-battleground-wave-12/\">CNBC-Change Research on Wednesday,</a> found that Biden currently leads Trump by 3 points in six battleground states, and his lead is narrowing.&#160;</p><p>Back in October 2016, as polls showed Clinton with a commanding lead over Trump and many pundits were writing off his chances, Moore warned that \"Trump's election is going to be the biggest 'f*** you' ever recorded in human history.\"</p><p>\"Whether Trump means it or not is kind of irrelevant because he's saying the things to people who are hurting, and that's why every beaten-down, nameless, forgotten working stiff who used to be part of what was called the middle class loves Trump,\" Moore said at the time.&#160;</p><div class=\"read-original\">Read the original article on <a href='https://www.businessinsider.com/michael-moore-trump-on-course-for-win-in-presidential-election-2020-8'>Business Insider</a></div><div class=\"feedflare\">\n<a src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/typepad/alleyinsider/silicon_alley_insider/~4/CsjE_ZMe8rI\" height=\"1\" width=\"1\" alt=\"\"/>","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Sun, 30 Aug 2020 10:19:19 +0000","feedId":2931,"bgimg":"https://i.insider.com/5f4b6ded7ffa48002894d0b0?format=jpeg","linkMd5":"ba6b434026ed9b66fc57d97be29e58bd","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx25/cdn63@2020_2/2020/08/31/06-00-52-298_035b71c8829d6d5b.webp","destWidth":2000,"destHeight":1500,"sourceBytes":91734,"destBytes":91734,"author":"tporter@businessinsider.com (Tom Porter)","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://i.insider.com/5f4b6dd960bf1f002807961a?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx1/cdn37@2020_1/2020/08/31/06-00-53-873_4b0f7cd3399c76a4.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/typepad/alleyinsider/silicon_alley_insider?i=CsjE_ZMe8rI:IIRWRxpJnLw:V_sGLiPBpWU":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx7/cdn68@2020_6/2020/08/31/06-00-59-200_11357f3068050e57.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/typepad/alleyinsider/silicon_alley_insider?d=qj6IDK7rITs":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx4/cdn81@2020_2/2020/08/31/06-00-57-877_99a57cc2511f53cd.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/typepad/alleyinsider/silicon_alley_insider?d=bcOpcFrp8Mo":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx10/cdn53@2020_2/2020/08/31/06-00-56-954_403f715e664a4d00.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/typepad/alleyinsider/silicon_alley_insider?i=CsjE_ZMe8rI:IIRWRxpJnLw:gIN9vFwOqvQ":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx24/cdn17@2020_2/2020/08/31/06-00-57-442_bc793184f580ad80.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/typepad/alleyinsider/silicon_alley_insider?d=cGdyc7Q-1BI":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx29/cdn70@2020_3/2020/08/31/06-01-02-412_be4dce30169e75ab.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/typepad/alleyinsider/silicon_alley_insider?d=QXVau8BzmBE":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx5oss/cdn2@2020_6/2020/08/31/06-01-03-283_c4d57f9dd1ff11a2.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/typepad/alleyinsider/silicon_alley_insider?d=yIl2AUoC8zA":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx/cdn46@2020_1/2020/08/31/06-01-03-681_0165ab2292566722.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/typepad/alleyinsider/silicon_alley_insider?d=7Q72WNTAKBA":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx12/cdn18@2020_6/2020/08/31/06-00-58-166_b28aa1f69f1eb446.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/typepad/alleyinsider/silicon_alley_insider/~4/CsjE_ZMe8rI":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx19/cdn37@2020_6/2020/08/31/06-00-54-765_b81211c7ad744faa.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598853650337},{"createdTime":"2020-08-31 14:00:50","updatedTime":"2020-08-31 14:00:50","title":"16 high-paying jobs you can do from home without a college degree","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/high-paying-jobs-work-from-home-without-college-degree-2020-8","description":"<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f47c288cd2fec00296a4874?format=jpeg\" alt=\"work from home\" height=\"1332\" width=\"1776\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Not every job that you can do from home requires a college degree.\n<p class=\"copyright\">SeventyFour/Getty Images</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><ul class=\"summary-list\"><li>Researchers from <a href=\"https://bfi.uchicago.edu/working-paper/how-many-jobs-can-be-done-at-home/\">The University of Chicago</a> analyzed which jobs can be done from home given their characteristics and work duties.</li><li>Given this classification of telework jobs, we decided to look at which jobs are high-paying and can be done from home but do not require a college degree.</li><li>Using education requirements and typical salary data from the <a href=\"https://www.bls.gov/emp/documentation/education-training-system.htm\">Bureau of Labor Statistics</a>, we looked at jobs from the University of Chicago list that earn more than the US average annual salary and where the typical minimum education is a high school diploma or no formal education.</li><li>Transportation managers made the top of the list with an average annual salary of $103,320 and a minimum educational requirement of a high school diploma or equivalent.</li><li><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/?hprecirc-bullet\">Visit Business Insider's homepage for more stories</a>.</li></ul><p>The kinds of jobs that can be done from home range from managers and supervisors to sales agents, and not all of these jobs require you to be a college graduate.</p><p>Jonathan Dingel and Brent Neiman from The University of Chicago <a href=\"https://bfi.uchicago.edu/working-paper/how-many-jobs-can-be-done-at-home/\">researched</a> the kinds of job that can potentially be done from home based on an occupation's characteristics and responsibilities found on <a href=\"https://www.onetonline.org/\">The Department of Labor's Occupational Information Network (O*NET)</a>.&#160;</p><p>Using two work questionnaires on O*NET, if an occupation met conditions like a \"majority of respondents say they work outdoors every day\" or \"performing general physical activities is very important,\" then the researchers classified this occupation as one that cannot be done from home. The full list of these kinds of questions can be found in their <a href=\"https://bfi.uchicago.edu/wp-content/uploads/BFI_White-Paper_Dingel_Neiman_3.2020.pdf\">white paper</a>.&#160;</p><p>To check this method, the researchers manually gave each occupation their own score. The O*NET and manual classifications were mostly the same, agreeing for about 85% of the jobs.</p><p>Athletes, coaches, umpires, and related workers were one of the jobs that did not match between the two assessments. The O*NET classification found these jobs can likely be done from home, while their manual classification believed these jobs are not suited for telework. Private detectives and investigators showed a similar difference.</p><p>Based on their O*NET method, they found about 37% of occupations can likely be done remotely.&#160;</p><p>Given the large number of people working from home during the pandemic, Business Insider decided to look at high-paying remote jobs that don't require a college education. To do this, we used The University of Chicago's classification of jobs that likely can be done from home based on the O*NET classification scheme and found those where the typical minimum requirement is a high school diploma or its equivalent, or does not have a particular educational requirement. Of these occupations, we looked at those that make more than $53,490, the average annual salary of all occupations as of May 2019.&#160;</p><p>The following are the 16 highest-paying jobs that you can do from home that don't require a college degree based on O*NET classifications. Education and occupational data are from the <a href=\"https://www.bls.gov/oes/current/oes_nat.htm\">Bureau of Labor Statistics</a>.&#160;</p>\n<div id=\"slideshow\">\n\t16. Brokerage clerks\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f457d5642f43f001ddff02d?format=jpeg\" alt=\"worker calculating figures\" height=\"1334\" width=\"1778\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Witthaya Prasongsin/Getty Images</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p><strong>Education requirement: </strong>High school diploma or equivalent</p><p><strong>Salary:&#160;</strong>$55,190&#160;</p><p><strong>Number of people employed: </strong>47,990&#160;</p>\n\t15. Private detectives and investigators\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f47c184db1ed000297143aa?format=jpeg\" alt=\"detective\" height=\"1333\" width=\"1778\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">South_agency/Getty Images</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p><strong>Education requirement: </strong>High school diploma or equivalent</p><p><strong>Salary:&#160;</strong>$57,000&#160;</p><p><strong>Number of people employed: </strong>35,000&#160;</p><p><em>While the job-characteristic-based method found private detectives and investigators can work from home, the researchers' manual assignment found that this occupation probably cannot work from home.&#160;</em></p>\n\t14. First-line supervisors of transportation and material moving workers, except aircraft cargo handling supervisors\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f457bd742f43f001ddff01f?format=jpeg\" alt=\"First-Line Supervisors of Transportation and Material Moving Workers\" height=\"1333\" width=\"1777\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Fertnig/Getty Images</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p><strong>Education requirement: </strong>High school diploma or equivalent</p><p><strong>Salary:&#160;</strong>$57,840&#160;</p><p><strong>Number of people employed: </strong>455,390&#160;</p>\n\t13. First-line supervisors of office and administrative support workers\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5d31fd31b44ce71a15203122?format=jpeg\" alt=\"coworker administrative assistant\" height=\"1414\" width=\"1885\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Steve Debenport/Getty Images</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p><strong>Education requirement: </strong>High school diploma or equivalent</p><p><strong>Salary:&#160;</strong>$60,130&#160;</p><p><strong>Number of people employed: </strong>1,487,870&#160;</p>\n\t12. Farm labor contractors\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5e54387ffee23d637b023072?format=jpeg\" alt=\"farmer\" height=\"1985\" width=\"2647\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Per Breiehagen/Getty Images</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p><strong>Education requirement: </strong>None</p><p><strong>Salary:&#160;</strong>$62,060&#160;</p><p><strong>Number of people employed: </strong>160&#160;</p>\n\t11. Executive secretaries and executive administrative assistants\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5d31fd30b44ce71a1520311e?format=jpeg\" alt=\"coworker administrative assistant\" height=\"1414\" width=\"1885\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">sturti/Getty Images</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p><strong>Education requirement: </strong>High school diploma or equivalent</p><p><strong>Salary:&#160;</strong>$62,920&#160;</p><p><strong>Number of people employed: </strong>542,690&#160;</p>\n\t10. Insurance sales agents\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5e679b97e4f9fe136c7738fa?format=jpeg\" alt=\"sales agent\" height=\"1334\" width=\"1778\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">fizkes/Shutterstock</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p><strong>Education requirement: </strong>High school diploma or equivalent</p><p><strong>Salary:&#160;</strong>$67,780&#160;</p><p><strong>Number of people employed: </strong>410,050&#160;</p>\n\t9. Claims adjusters, examiners, and investigators\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f47c7d6db1ed000297143f3?format=jpeg\" alt=\"claims adjuster home repair\" height=\"1333\" width=\"1778\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">SDI Productions/Getty Images</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p><strong>Education requirement: </strong>High school diploma or equivalent</p><p><strong>Salary:&#160;</strong>$68,940&#160;</p><p><strong>Number of people employed: </strong>287,960&#160;</p>\n\t8. Wholesale and manufacturing sales representatives, except technical and scientific products\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5e2efd4e5bc79c508a6b9d34?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Sales rep \" height=\"5395\" width=\"7193\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Katleho Seisa/Getty Images</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p><strong>Education requirement: </strong>High school diploma or equivalent</p><p><strong>Salary:&#160;</strong>$71,110&#160;</p><p><strong>Number of people employed: </strong>1,344,530&#160;</p>\n\t7. Property, real estate, and community association managers\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f05e9c5f34d0547883fbbf4?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Real Estate investors\" height=\"3404\" width=\"4539\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Education Images / Contributor/Getty Images</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p><strong>Education requirement: </strong>High school diploma or equivalent</p><p><strong>Salary:&#160;</strong>$71,720&#160;</p><p><strong>Number of people employed: </strong>220,750&#160;</p>\n\t6. Postmasters and mail superintendents\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f383bc2e89ebf001f045061?format=jpeg\" alt=\"usps\" height=\"683\" width=\"911\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>A United States Postal Service (USPS) mail box stands in Manhattan on August 05, 2020 in New York City.\n<p class=\"copyright\"><a href=\"https://www.gettyimages.com/detail/news-photo/united-states-postal-service-mail-box-stands-in-manhattan-news-photo/1264164585?adppopup=true\" target=\"_blank\">Spencer Platt/Getty Images</a></p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p><strong>Education requirement: </strong>High school diploma or equivalent</p><p><strong>Salary:&#160;</strong>$78,220&#160;</p><p><strong>Number of people employed: </strong>13,850&#160;</p>\n\t5. Real estate brokers\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f35b152b4bb1c001df53340?format=jpeg\" alt=\"real estate\" height=\"1414\" width=\"1885\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">courtneyk/Getty Images</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p><strong>Education requirement: </strong>High school diploma or equivalent</p><p><strong>Salary:&#160;</strong>$81,450&#160;</p><p><strong>Number of people employed: </strong>42,730</p>\n\t4. Intelligence analysts\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f47c03ccd2fec00296a4854?format=jpeg\" alt=\"analyst data charts\" height=\"1125\" width=\"1500\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Laurence Dutton/Getty Images</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p><strong>Education requirement: </strong>High school diploma or equivalent</p><p><strong>Salary:&#160;</strong>$86,030&#160;</p><p><strong>Number of people employed: </strong>105,620&#160;</p><p><em>Intelligence agents are included in the broader category of detectives and criminal investigators, but the researchers at University of Chicago found criminal investigators and special agents likely cannot work from home. These specific occupation titles from O*NET, intelligence analysts and criminal investigators and special agents, both use wage data for detectives and criminal investigators from BLS.</em></p>\n\t3. First-line supervisors of non-retail sales workers\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f45767242f43f001ddfefe9?format=jpeg\" alt=\"employees office sales\" height=\"1333\" width=\"1778\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Moyo Studio/Getty Images</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p><strong>Education requirement: </strong>High school diploma or equivalent</p><p><strong>Salary:&#160;</strong>$86,180&#160;</p><p><strong>Number of people employed: </strong>249,090&#160;</p>\n\t2. Athletes and sports competitors\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f4575bf89aff80028ab7e3a?format=jpeg\" alt=\"In this still image from video provided by the NFL, NFL Commissioner Roger Goodell during the NFL football draft, Saturday, April 25, 2020. (NFL via AP)\" height=\"1332\" width=\"1776\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>In this still image from video provided by the NFL, NFL Commissioner Roger Goodell during the NFL football draft, Saturday, April 25, 2020. (NFL via AP)\n<p class=\"copyright\">Associated Press</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p><strong>Education requirement: </strong>None</p><p><strong>Salary:&#160;</strong>$93,140&#160;</p><p><strong>Number of people employed: </strong>11,330&#160;</p><p><em>While the O*NET job-characteristic-based method found athletes can work from home, the researchers' manual assignment found that this occupation probably cannot work from home.&#160;</em></p>\n\t1. Transportation, storage, and distribution managers\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f4576c889aff80028ab7e44?format=jpeg\" alt=\"fulfillment warehouse\" height=\"1333\" width=\"1778\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Hybrid Images/Getty Images</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p><strong>Education requirement: </strong>High school diploma or equivalent</p><p><strong>Salary:&#160;</strong>$103,320&#160;</p><p><strong>Number of people employed: </strong>132,040&#160;</p>\n</div><div class=\"read-original\">Read the original article on <a myreaderx/cdn46@2020_1/2020/08/31/06-01-03-681_0165ab2292566722.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/typepad/alleyinsider/silicon_alley_insider?d=7Q72WNTAKBA":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx12/cdn18@2020_6/2020/08/31/06-00-58-166_b28aa1f69f1eb446.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/typepad/alleyinsider/silicon_alley_insider/~4/aVmnrDWEgik":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx3/cdn13@2020_4/2020/08/31/06-00-56-829_061f5c44368ae61d.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598853650331},{"createdTime":"2020-08-31 14:00:50","updatedTime":"2020-08-31 14:00:50","title":"Billionaire Mark Cuban says he scored a 1,000% return on Netflix and a 500% return on Amazon using a strategy of sticking with companies he believes in","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/mark-cuban-investing-strategy-returns-netflix-amazon-trading-companies-believes-2020-8","description":"<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f47c344db1ed000297143c5?format=jpeg\" alt=\"mark cuban\" height=\"1249\" width=\"2500\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Steven Ferdman/Getty Images</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><ul><li><strong>Mark Cuban told \"The David Rubenstein Show\" that his buy-and-hold strategy had led him to big returns on Netflix and Amazon.</strong></li><li><strong>The \"Shark Tank\" investor who owns the NBA's Dallas Mavericks said he stuck with companies he believed in.</strong></li><li><strong>Cuban also said he used to be an active trader but no longer was. \"There's a lot more money chasing fewer stocks, so it's harder to trade and be successful,\" he said.</strong></li></ul><ul><li><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/?hprecirc-bullet?utm_source=markets&utm_medium=ingestgest\"><strong>Visit Business Insider's homepage for more stories</strong></a><strong>.</strong></li></ul><hr ><p>The billionaire investor Mark Cuban spoke with \"<a href=\"https://www.bloomberg.com/news/videos/2020-08-27/the-david-rubenstein-show-dallas-mavericks-owner-mark-cuban-video?sref=VeWHXK2U\">The David Rubenstein Show</a>\" on Tuesday about his buy-and-hold strategy that he said had given him skyrocketing returns over the long term.</p><p>The Dallas Mavericks owner said he'd owned <a href=\"https://markets.businessinsider.com/stocks/nflx-stock\">Netflix</a> stock since it cost $50 a share. The streaming service closed Wednesday near $550, giving Cuban a roughly 1,000% return on his investment. He also said he was buying <a href=\"https://markets.businessinsider.com/stocks/amzn-stock\">Amazon</a> when it was between $500 and $700 and more recently had owned more shares at just under $2,000.</p><p>On Wednesday, Amazon closed at $3,441.85 &#8212; meaning an investment of $500 would have gained more than 500%. Cuban confirmed these returns with Business Insider.</p><p>Cuban said his strategy in recent years had been to stick with companies he believed in.&#160;</p><p>\"I pretty much make my own decisions,\" the \"Shark Tank\" investor told Rubenstein.&#160;</p><p>\"I used to trade a lot,\" he added. \"I used to be very, very active as a trader. And back in the '90s and early 2000s, there was a lot less money chasing more stocks, and now there's a lot more money chasing fewer stocks, so it's harder to trade and be successful.\"</p><p><em><strong>Read more:</strong> <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/stock-picks-to-buy-hedge-mutual-funds-market-favorites-goldman-2020-8\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">GOLDMAN SACHS: Buy these 9 stocks that are poised to continue crushing the market as the 'shared favorites' of Wall Street's biggest investors</a></em></p><p>Beyond Netflix and Amazon, Cuban said he had \"some scattered things\" that he'd \"owned over the years that I've held on to.\"<br ><br >But the investor said that he no longer traded the way he used to and that the Federal Reserve's inflation of financial assets had given him a tailwind.</p><p>Cuban added that while the coronavirus pandemic had forced many small businesses to close and harmed some large companies, this uncertainty created opportunities for new innovation, especially in the digital realm.</p><p>\"I think there's a lot of unique opportunities that are available to people who are creative, who have a vision for the future,\" he said. \"I think 10, 15, 20 years, we'll look back and there will be 10, 20, 30 world-class companies that were created by people who we probably are thinking are crazy right now.\"</p><p><em><strong>Read more:</strong> <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/stock-picking-strategy-from-portfolio-manager-who-spots-100x-winners-2020-8\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Chris Mayer wrote the book on how to make 100 times your money with a single stock. He gives an in-depth assessment of the latest company that 'checks all my boxes.'</a></em></p><div class=\"read-original\">Read the original article on <a 50330},{"createdTime":"2020-08-31 14:00:50","updatedTime":"2020-08-31 14:00:50","title":"Trump bragged that his autograph sells for $10,000 on eBay during a visit to hurricane-hit Louisiana","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/trump-told-an-autograph-seeker-to-sell-on-ebay-10000-2020-8","description":"<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f4b82d97ffa48002894d0be?format=jpeg\" alt=\"President trump autograph ebay $10,000\" height=\"1397\" width=\"2796\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>President Donald Trump hands an autograph over at a Lake Charles fire station during a visit to survey Hurricane Laura damage, in this video still.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Project Lincoln/Twitter</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><ul class=\"summary-list\"><li>President Donald Trump <a href=\"https://twitter.com/ProjectLincoln/status/1299795007923261442\">has suggested</a> that his autograph could sell for as much as $10,000 during a visit to hurricane-hit Louisiana.</li><li>The president was at Lake Charles fire station for a briefing on Hurricane Laura's impact,&#160;<a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com.au/hurricane-laura-death-toll-damage-updates-2020-8\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">which has killed 14 people</a>&#160;and left vast numbers of people without electricity.</li><li>Signing pieces of paper for autograph seekers, he said: \"Here, sell this tonight on eBay, you'll get 10,000.\"</li><li>On Friday, Trump <a href=\"https://www.fema.gov/press-release/20200828/president-donald-j-trump-approves-major-disaster-declaration-louisiana\">approved a declaration</a> that made FEMA funding available for Louisiana.</li><li><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/?hprecirc-bullet\">Visit Business Insider's homepage for more stories</a>.</li></ul><p>President Donald Trump said that his autograph could sell for $10,000 on eBay in remarks made during a visit to Louisiana to survey hurricane damage.</p><p>In footage circulated on social media, the president signed autographs for officials at a Lake Charles fire station, where he was briefed about conditions in the city following Hurricane Laura.</p><p>\"Here, sell this tonight on eBay, you'll get 10,000,\" he said, handing an autograph to a police officer. He elaborated on his signatures' value, telling another autograph-seeker: \"If I put your name down, it loses a lot of value. So just sell it tonight on eBay,\" to laughter from some onlookers.</p><p>Trump was visiting both Louisiana and Texas to view the damage from the hurricane, <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com.au/hurricane-laura-death-toll-damage-updates-2020-8\">which killed 14 people and left hundreds of thousands without power</a> as of Saturday.&#160;</p><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f4b84b960bf1f002807962a?format=jpeg\" alt=\"president trump visits lake charles louisiana hurricane storm laura damage\" height=\"961\" width=\"1923\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>President Donald Trump accompanied by officials during a visit to areas damaged by Hurricane Laura in Lake Charles, Louisiana, August 29, 2020\n<p class=\"copyright\">Tom Brenner/Reuters</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><p>On Friday, the president&#160;<a href=\"https://www.fema.gov/press-release/20200828/president-donald-j-trump-approves-major-disaster-declaration-louisiana\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">approved a major disaster declaration</a>&#160;for Louisiana, enabling the state to access FEMA relief funding.&#160;</p><p>\"Our hearts go out to families who lost loved ones,\" he said on Saturday, <a href=\"https://www.theadvertiser.com/story/news/2020/08/29/donald-trump-lake-charles-louisiana-hurricane-laura/5666813002/\">according to Lafayette newspaper The Daily Advertiser</a>.</p><p>The footage of him signing autographs was circulated by conservative anti-Trump campaign The Lincoln Project with the comment: \"Unbelievable.\"</p><blockquote class=\"twitter-tweet blockquote\" data-lang=\"en\" data-cards=\"\" data-conversation=\"\">&#8212;The Lincoln Project  (@ProjectLincoln) <a href=\"https://twitter.com/mims/statuses/1299795007923261442?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw\">August 29, 2020</a></blockquote><script async src=\"//platform.twitter.com/widgets.js\" charset=\"utf-8\"></script><p><a href=\"https://markets.businessinsider.com/news/stocks/trump-jokes-ebay-boeing-jpmorgan-execs-after-china-trade-deal-2020-1-1028822366\">Trump has previously bragged</a> about the value of his signature, telling eBay's interim CEO in January that even \"senators and congressmen\" put his autograph up for sale.&#160;</p><p><a href=\"https://www.ebay.co.uk/sch/i.html?_from=R40&_trksid=p2380057.m570.l1313&_nkw=trump+autograph&_sacat=0amp;_sacat=0\">Numerous items</a> purportedly signed by the president end up on sale on eBay, though few sell for much more than $1,000 at the time of writing.</p><div class=\"read-original\">Read the original article on <a src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/typepad/alleyinsider/silicon_alley_insider?d=yIl2AUoC8zA\" border=\"0\"></img></a> <a src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/typepad/alleyinsider/silicon_alley_insider?d=7Q72WNTAKBA\" border=\"0\"></img></a>\n</div><img src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/typepad/alleyinsider/silicon_alley_insider/~4/BNiL3DWU-OQ\" height=\"1\" width=\"1\" alt=\"\"/>","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Sun, 30 Aug 2020 11:44:14 +0000","feedId":2931,"bgimg":"https://i.insider.com/5f4b831260bf1f0028079628?format=jpeg","linkMd5":"a82da0bb4ec8f10f3421b4bd92053ffd","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx11/cdn48@2020_4/2020/08/31/06-00-52-365_0d7eecab08d6a1b3.webp","destWidth":2269,"destHeight":1701,"sourceBytes":62662,"destBytes":62662,"author":"mjankowicz@businessinsider.com (Mia Jankowicz)","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://i.insider.com/5f4b82d97ffa48002894d0be?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx10/cdn35@2020_5/2020/08/31/06-00-56-195_856f41b776b9e59e.webp","https://i.insider.com/5f4b84b960bf1f002807962a?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx3/cdn45@2020_1/2020/08/31/06-00-58-422_25e66b3a12d1bf3e.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/typepad/alleyinsider/silicon_alley_insider?i=BNiL3DWU-OQ:Xwry813kA7A:V_sGLiPBpWU":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx2/cdn34@2020_5/2020/08/31/06-01-02-843_ccbe4c18c9bdd464.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/typepad/alleyinsider/silicon_alley_insider?d=qj6IDK7rITs":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx4/cdn81@2020_2/2020/08/31/06-00-57-877_99a57cc2511f53cd.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/typepad/alleyinsider/silicon_alley_insider?d=bcOpcFrp8Mo":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx10/cdn53@2020_2/2020/08/31/06-00-56-954_403f715e664a4d00.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/typepad/alleyinsider/silicon_alley_insider?i=BNiL3DWU-OQ:Xwry813kA7A:gIN9vFwOqvQ":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx21/cdn28@2020_2/2020/08/31/06-00-59-914_ad688e54ee3bc358.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/typepad/alleyinsider/silicon_alley_insider?d=cGdyc7Q-1BI":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx29/cdn70@2020_3/2020/08/31/06-01-02-412_be4dce30169e75ab.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/typepad/alleyinsider/silicon_alley_insider?d=QXVau8BzmBE":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx5oss/cdn2@2020_6/2020/08/31/06-01-03-283_c4d57f9dd1ff11a2.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/typepad/alleyinsider/silicon_alley_insider?d=yIl2AUoC8zA":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx/cdn46@2020_1/2020/08/31/06-01-03-681_0165ab2292566722.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/typepad/alleyinsider/silicon_alley_insider?d=7Q72WNTAKBA":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx12/cdn18@2020_6/2020/08/31/06-00-58-166_b28aa1f69f1eb446.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/typepad/alleyinsider/silicon_alley_insider/~4/BNiL3DWU-OQ":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx32/cdn22@2020_6/2020/08/31/06-00-56-048_f6fd2fc0d4c2428d.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598853650337},{"createdTime":"2020-08-31 14:00:50","updatedTime":"2020-08-31 14:00:50","title":"The 16 best gins to add to your liquor cabinet, according to industry experts","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-gins-to-drink-according-to-experts-2020-6","description":"<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5ee3935a988ee3299127fea4?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Hayman&#39;s Old Tom Gin\" height=\"1093\" width=\"1457\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Hayman&#39;s Old Tom Gin.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Courtesy of Hayman&#39;s</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><ul class=\"summary-list\"><li>Nothing says summer sipping quite like a glass of gin, topped with tonic water and a slice of lime.</li><li>The herb-infused liquor can vary widely in taste from different distilleries, but generally contains touches of spicy juniper berries, aromatic pine, and refreshing citrus.</li><li>If you enjoy a lighter spirit, try the Japanese Roku Gin with flavors of Yuzu peel and green tea; if you prefer something with a kick, reach for the Irish Drumshanbo Gunpowder Gin which blends orris root from Morocco and cardamom from India.</li><li><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/?hprecirc-bullet\">Visit Business Insider's homepage for more stories</a>.</li></ul><p>After a long (okay, ridiculously long) spring, we're finally ready for a sip of summer... with a gin, a splash of tonic, and a wedge of lime, of course.</p><p>Gin is a juniper-infused distilled spirit that hails originally from the British Isles. There are a number of different gin styles and classifications, but what they all have in common is the predominant flavor of juniper berries. After that, gin producers concoct their own combination of \"botanicals,\" which are other natural ingredients and flavorings, to give their own distinct gin spin.</p><p>\"Like most things in the food and beverage world, deciding which is the 'best' or 'good' is simply a matter of taste and flavor preference,\" said Henrik Muehle, the general manager of London's Flemings Mayfair Hotel and a board member of Small Luxury Hotels of the World. The five-star hotel is known for the personal \"gin bars\" that they stock in guests' suites with a variety of small batch gins. \"For me, the hallmarks of any 'good' gin come down to the distillation process and the botanicals.\"</p><p>To start, he says, how the gin is distilled becomes the first essential piece that creates the base on top of which the juniper and other botanicals will be added.</p><p>\"The better the distillation process, the more pure the base will be,\" he said. \"A good gin with the right amount of botanicals, simply needs a bit of citrus and tonic to bring out all the natural flavors.\"</p><p>Today there are hundreds of gins, from the big name brands to the small, craft distilleries. We've reached out to several spirits experts to determine which gins are the ones you need to know right now.&#160;&#160;</p>\n<div id=\"slideshow\">\n\t1. Roku Gin\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5ee29354f0f4193d3032b8e4?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Roku gin\" height=\"960\" width=\"960\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Roku gin.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Courtesy of Roku</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p><a href=\"https://go.skimresources.com?id=35871X943606&#38;xs=1&#38;url=https%3A%2F%2Fdrizly.com%2Fliquor%2Fgin%2Froku-japanese-gin%2Fp87943\" rel=\"nofollow sponsored\">Roku</a> is the Japanese word for number six. In this case, it's a reference to the six Japanese botanicals in <a href=\"https://rokugin.suntory.com/en/global\">Roku Gin</a>.</p><p>\"Sakura flower, sakura leaf, Yuzu peel, sencha tea, Gyokuro (green) tea, and Sansho pepper,\" said Muehle. \"This is a delicate and smooth gin with subtle, sweet citrus, and delicate floral notes.\"</p><p>He recommends it with a light tonic or as a sipping gin with a splash of sparkling water.&#160;</p>\n\t2. Williams Elegant 48\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5ee2a58d2618b95b2c6883a3?format=jpeg\" alt=\"williams elegant 48 1l 1545962 s515\" height=\"1000\" width=\"1000\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Williams Elegant 48 Gin.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Courtesy of Williams Elegant</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p>What makes <a href=\"https://distiller.com/spirits/williams-elegant-48-gin\">Williams Elegant 48 Gin</a> so unique is that it's distilled from 48 varieties of rare apples, which grow in 200-year-old orchards on a farm just north of London, England. Muehle adds that other botanicals include juniper, citrus, and floral notes, giving it a clean and aromatic taste.</p><p>\"While this gin makes particularly good martini, I personally like this served with elderflower tonic, garnished with a slice of green apple,\" he said.</p>\n\t3. Martin Millers\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5ee2a5e0f0f4194a2e464064?format=jpeg\" alt=\"martin millers gin\" height=\"404\" width=\"404\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Martin Millers gin.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Courtesy of Martin Millers.</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p>If you're looking for small batch gin, look no further than <a href=\"https://www.martinmillersgin.com/the-gin/\">Martin Millers</a>. Distilled in a small batch pot still in England, it is shipped to Iceland where it is reduced to bottling strength with fresh spring water.&#160;</p><p>\"While this gin is a touch spicier than most, its clean taste and superb balance make it hugely enjoyable,\" said Muehle. \"With refreshing notes of citrus followed by notes of cardamom and black pepper, it has a clean taste and a slightly spicy, warming finish.\"</p><p>He recommends drinking it with tonic and garnishing with fresh strawberry and a crack of black pepper.</p>\n\t4. King of Soho\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5ee38a7f5af6cc7aa150e7f4?format=jpeg\" alt=\"King of Soho 70cl.PNG\" height=\"2970\" width=\"1915\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>King of Soho.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Courtesy of King of Soho</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p><a href=\"https://spiritofsoho.com/the-king-of-soho-gin/\">King of Soho</a> gin is made by Howard Raymond, who is the son of Paul Raymond, a property tycoon known for his work that shaped the face of London's Soho neighborhood.</p><p>Muehle loves this gin for its juniper and herbal notes, along with grapefruit flavors. He describes it as smooth and elegant with a delicate licorice sweetness. He says it is the perfect choice for a classic Negroni.</p>\n\t5. Ferdinand's Saar Dry Gin\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5ee38ba5988ee323ce056dc8?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Ferdinands_SaarDryGin_50cl_4c 2\" height=\"3508\" width=\"2480\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Ferdinand&#39;s Saar Dry Gin.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Courtesy of Ferdinand&#39;s</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p>Hailing from Germany, <a href=\"https://www.ferdinandsgin.com/\">Ferdinand's Saar Dry Gin</a> gives its drinkers a true sense of place. It's crafted with more than 30 different botanicals, including a small amount of semi-sweet Riesling, a wine native to Germany.&#160;</p><p>\"Floral notes with lavender and lemongrass are followed by subtle citrus and rose him,\" said Muehle. \"It has an incredibly soft and dry finish with a long aftertaste.\"&#160;</p><p>He recommends it in a dry martini or with Mediterranean tonic.</p>\n\t6. Gin Mare\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5ee38bef2618b917a97d8299?format=jpeg\" alt=\"gin mare gin\" height=\"1080\" width=\"1080\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Gin Mare gin.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Courtesy of Gin Mare</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p>With botanicals like basil, rosemary, and Arbequina olives, <a href=\"https://www.ginmare.com/en/\">Gin Mare</a> is all about capturing the essence of the Mediterranean Sea. It's fitting, seeing as it's distilled in Spain. Muehle loves <a href=\"https://go.skimresources.com?id=35871X943606&#38;xs=1&#38;url=https%3A%2F%2Fdrizly.com%2Fliquor%2Fgin%2Fmodern-gin%2Fgin-mare%2Fp20235\" rel=\"nofollow sponsored\">this memorable gin</a> served with Mediterranean tonic and garnished with fresh thyme or in a dry martini.</p>\n\t7. Tanqueray Ten\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5ee38c255af6cc7c3e507f73?format=jpeg\" alt=\"tanqueray gin (1)\" height=\"1876\" width=\"1500\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Tanqueray Ten.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Courtesy of Tanqueray</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p>When you say <a href=\"https://go.skimresources.com?id=35871X943606&#38;xs=1&#38;url=https%3A%2F%2Fdrizly.com%2Fliquor%2Fgin%2Fmodern-gin%2Ftanqueray-no-ten-gin%2Fp147\" rel=\"nofollow sponsored\">gin</a>, the first thing that inevitably comes to mind is the good old fashioned gin and tonic. The G&#38;T is a classic, whether it's World Gin Day or not. If you're mixing up a few this weekend, Kara Newman, the spirits editor for Wine Enthusiast magazine and author of several cocktail books, most recently \"Cocktails with a Twist,\" recommends reaching for the <a href=\"https://www.tanqueray.com/en-us/gins/n%C2%BA-ten/\">Tanqueray Ten</a>.</p><p>\"Clean, crisp, classic,\" Newman said. \"It's more citrusy than the standard Tanqueray Dry, but still has a harmonious mix of grapefruit, citrus, and juniper.\"</p>\n\t8. Plymouth Gin\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5ee38c525af6cc7c6a65cd86?format=jpeg\" alt=\"plymouth gin\" height=\"2048\" width=\"1639\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Plymouth gin.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Courtesy of Plymouth</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p>Distilled in Plymouth, England, <a href=\"https://www.plymouthgin.com/en-EN\">Plymouth Gin</a> is one of the world's most recognized brands &#8212; and for good reason. Newman recommends it because it is a full-bodied gin that goes light on the juniper.</p><p>\"This makes it versatile enough for a wide range of cocktails,\" she told Business Insider. Her favorite cocktail to use <a href=\"https://click.linksynergy.com/deeplink?id=EHFxW6yx8Uo&#38;mid=2025&#38;murl=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.wine.com%2Fproduct%2Fplymouth-gin-plymouth-english-gin%2F526500%3F\" rel=\"nofollow sponsored\">Plymouth</a> with is a Negroni.</p>\n\t9. Fords Gin\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5ee38cbc3ad86112c23a4c93?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Fords gin\" height=\"1366\" width=\"1821\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Fords Gin.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Courtesy of Fords</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p><a href=\"https://www.fordsgin.com/\">Fords</a>, distilled in London, is the brainchild of eighth generation master distillers Charles Maxwell and Simon Ford. The gin is steeped for 15 hours with a botanical blend prior to distillation.&#160; Newman likes <a href=\"https://click.linksynergy.com/deeplink?id=EHFxW6yx8Uo&#38;mid=2025&#38;murl=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.wine.com%2Fproduct%2Ffords-london-dry-gin%2F529677%3F\" rel=\"nofollow sponsored\">Fords</a> for its notes of citrus, spice, and a distinct note of cilantro. She calls it a great \"workhorse gin,\" and prefers to sip it in martinis and gimlets.&#160;</p>\n\t10. St. George Terroir Mount Tam Gin\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5ee38d43f0f41909ab51f0a5?format=jpeg\" alt=\"St. George Terroir Mount Tam Gin\" height=\"3774\" width=\"3603\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>St. George Terroir Mount Tam Gin.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Courtesy of St. George Gin</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p>Cocktails with a conscience. That's what <a href=\"http://www.stgeorgespirits.com/\">this gin</a> is all about, seeing as they donate a portion of their profits to the California wilderness. This distinct boutique-style gin comes from a craft distiller in Alameda, California. You'll notice strong notes of pine, probably because one of the botanicals used is Douglas fir. Others include fennel and sage.</p><p>\"The foresty flavor plays well with lime,\" Newman said. \"I'd mix it into a <a href=\"https://imbibemagazine.com/southside-fizz-recipe/\">Southside Fizz</a>.\"</p>\n\t11. Ki No Bi Kyoto Dry Gin\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5ee38d69988ee324b460de95?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Ki No Bi Kyoto Dry Gin\" height=\"532\" width=\"528\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Ki No Bi Kyoto Dry Gin.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Courtesy of Kyoto Distillery</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p>Japan definitely has a share of the market cornered when it comes to whiskey, but did you know that they've also got a strong grasp on gins, as well? <a href=\"https://kyotodistillery.jp/en-GB/products/kinobi/\">This one</a> is from a small producer in Kyoto. It's rice-based with floral notes that are evocative of shiso and bamboo leaf.</p><p>\"What I love about the new-isa wave of Japan-made gins is their incredibly light, silky texture,\" said Newman. \"I'd gladly have this in a martini-style drink with a shiso garnish, or highball-style in a 'sonic' &#8212; gin, soda water, and tonic.\"</p>\n\t12. Hayman's Old Tom\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5ee391aaf0f4190e9a112074?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Hayman&#39;s Old Tom Gin\" height=\"1943\" width=\"1457\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Hayman&#39;s Old Tom Gin.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Courtesy of Hayman&#39;s</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p>What's neat about <a href=\"https://www.haymansgin.com/old-tom-gin\">Hayman's Old Tom Gin</a> is that it's distilled in a style that dates back to the 19th century, which leaves it tasting slightly sweet.</p><p>\"The result,\" said Newman, \"is that the citrus reads a bit like candied lemon peel, but it's not too heavy-handed.\" She recommends this to mix a <a href=\"https://www.liquor.com/recipes/martinez/\">Martinez</a> cocktail.</p>\n\t13. Silent Pool Gin\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5ee391deaee6a8048e02e193?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Silent Pool Gin\" height=\"720\" width=\"960\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Silent Pool Gin.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Courtesy of Silent Pool Gin</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p>What stands out with <a href=\"https://silentpooldistillers.com/\">Silent Pool Gin</a> is its versatility. It can be enjoyed in a simple gin and tonic, or mixed in a variety of different cocktails. What's noticeable about <a href=\"https://click.linksynergy.com/deeplink?id=EHFxW6yx8Uo&#38;mid=2025&#38;murl=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.wine.com%2Fproduct%2Fsilent-pool-gin%2F528608%3F\" rel=\"nofollow sponsored\">this gin</a> is the toned down juniper flavor, which allows for the 23 other botanicals to shine through.&#160;</p><p>\"We tried [this gin] and loved it,\" said Piero Procida, director of food and beverage at The London West Hollywood at Beverly Hills. \"The distillation process is very well thought-out and specific to this gin and what is left is a very high quality gin, with a sweet floral-like nose and a savory flavor.\"&#160;</p><p>Procida features this cocktail in the hotel's signature drink, the London Calling, made with hibiscus liqueur, grapefruit, lemon, and agave.</p><p>&#160;</p>\n\t14. The Botanist Islay Dry Gin\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5ee3922f5af6cc01e2251dd6?format=jpeg\" alt=\"The Botanist Islay Dry Gin\" height=\"1160\" width=\"1160\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>The Botanist Islay Dry Gin.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Courtesy of The Botanist</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p><a href=\"https://www.thebotanist.com/\">This particular gin</a> hails from Scotland from Islay, an island typically known for its scotches. Made from 31 different botanicals, it is ranked as one of the highest quality gins in the world.</p><p>\"You are going to find a big nose of citrus in this gin, with slight menthol and lots of floral qualities... with a nice, long, spicy finish,\" said Procida. \"You are still going to find that typical juniper characteristic in this gin, but it certainly does not overpower the other flavors.\"</p><p>Procida says <a href=\"https://click.linksynergy.com/deeplink?id=EHFxW6yx8Uo&#38;mid=2025&#38;murl=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.wine.com%2Fproduct%2Fthe-botanist-islay-dry-gin%2F530801%3F\" rel=\"nofollow sponsored\">The Botanist</a> is a favorite because it is a boutique-style gin that is all about quality and versatility. With so many different botanicals, it is easy to pair it with other ingredients to make several styles of cocktails.</p>\n\t15. Drumshanbo Gunpowder Gin\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5ee3925e988ee328c7587a45?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Drumshanbo Gunpowder Gin\" height=\"2048\" width=\"1365\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Drumshanbo Gunpowder Gin.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Courtesy of Drumshanbo</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p>What draws most people into <a href=\"https://drumshanbogunpowderirishgin.com/\">Drumshanbo Gunpowder Gin</a> is the name itself. \"When I saw 'gunpowder,' all I could think of was the smell of firecrackers, but it intrigued me enough to taste it,\" said Procida. \"The name itself is actually in reference to the gunpowder green tea from China, which is used as one of its botanicals and one of its predominant flavors.\"</p><p>Other ingredients include juniper from Macedonia, orris root from Morocco, cardamom from India, and others. Procida favors this gin, calling it \"art in a bottle.\" \"For a boutique hotel that enjoys exploring the world of craft ingredients, this gin is the closest thing to craft you will get,\" he said.</p><p><br /><br /></p>\n\t16. Sipsmith Gin\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f4960177ffa48002894cf60?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Sipsmith Gin\" height=\"1239\" width=\"1652\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Sipsmith Gin.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Sipsmith Gin</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p><a href=\"https://sipsmith.com/our-spirits/#:~:text=A%20particularly%20dry%20gin%20with%20a%20zesty%2C%20citrus%20finish.&#38;text=Bold%2C%20complex%20and%20aromatic%20%E2%80%93%20smooth,with%20its%20resinous%2C%20juniper%20notes.\">Sipsmith Gin</a> serves up a few different styles of gin. Its London Dry Gin is classic and bold, with floral notes on the nose, a strong juniper-forward taste, and a finish that hints of lemon. The Lemon Drizzle Gin is more sweet on the nose, with hints of vanilla and a licorice finish. The Zesty Orange Ginhas more of a tangy finish, with a hint of sweet cinnamon.</p><p>\"When it comes to gin I prefer a classic, juniper forward London Dry style for icy cold martini. Sipsmith Gin is one of my favorites for everything from martinis and Negronis, to gin &#38; tonics,\" said Prairie Rose, a Wine and Spirit Education Trust (WSET)-trained drinks writer and podcast host. \"It has a classic blueprint, but with a sexy, fresh, and modern quality.\"</p>\n</div><div class=\"read-original\">Read the original article on <a 14:00:50","updatedTime":"2020-08-31 14:00:50","title":"Trump will visit Kenosha, Wisconsin to meet with law enforcement, Jacob Blake's family, and 'survey' damage, sources say","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/trump-visit-kenosha-jacob-blake-shooting-protests-family-2020-8","description":"<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f4bc0a27ffa48002894d0df?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Trump Air Force One\" height=\"1500\" width=\"3000\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>President Donald Trump boards Air Force One as he departs Washington for travel to Florida at Joint Base Andrews, Maryland, US, July 31, 2020.\n<p class=\"copyright\">REUTERS/Tom Brenner</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><ul class=\"summary-list\"><li>President Donald Trump is slated to visit Kenosha, Wisconsin, on Tuesday in the wake of protests that erupted after police shot and wounded Jacob Blake, an unarmed Black man.</li><li>White House spokesman Judd Deere told reporters that Trump is set to meet with local law enforcement and \"survey damage from recent riots,\" <a href=\"https://nz.news.yahoo.com/trump-visit-kenosha-wake-racial-025339976.html\">AFP reported</a>.</li><li>The president's daughter-in-law Lara Trump said on \"Fox News Sunday\" that <a href=\"https://twitter.com/FoxNewsSunday/status/1300057966733930499\">Trump also scheduled a meeting with Blake's family while he's in Wisconsin</a>.</li><li>After a week of tensions in the city, the Associated Press reported that Trump's visit is sure to \"exacerbate tensions\" in Kenosha, and Democratic Rep. Karen Bass criticized the trip as designed to \"agitate things and to make things worse.\"</li><li><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/?hprecirc-bullet\">Visit Business Insider's homepage for more stories</a>.</li></ul><p>President Donald Trump is slated to visit Kenosha, Wisconsin on Tuesday, just over one week after police shot and wounded Jacob Blake, an unarmed Black man.</p><p>The White House announced the visit to reporters late Saturday, and White House spokesman Judd Deere specified that Trump will meet with local law enforcement and \"survey damage from recent riots,\" <a href=\"https://nz.news.yahoo.com/trump-visit-kenosha-wake-racial-025339976.html\">AFP reported</a>.</p><p>The president's daughter-in-law Lara Trump said on \"Fox News Sunday\" that <a href=\"https://twitter.com/FoxNewsSunday/status/1300057966733930499\">Trump is set to meet with Blake's family while he's in Wisconsin</a>.</p><p>However, the status of those plans is unclear, as an <a href=\"https://twitter.com/FaceTheNation/status/1300091795867537411\">attorney for the Blake family, Ben Crump, said on CBS' \"Face the Nation\" that they had not been contacted to meet with Trump</a>.&#160;</p><p>\"We will see,\" Crump said about a possible meeting with the president, before adding that the family had already met with Democratic nominee Joe Biden and Kamala Harris, who spoke with them \"for about an hour.\"</p><p>One day after Blake's father joined at least 1,000 other protesters in Kenosha, Crump said his parents are \"focused on trying to march for their son because he'll never be able to stand up for himself unless a miracle happens\"</p><p><a href=\"https://www.insider.com/picture-details-jacob-blake-black-man-shot-by-police-kenosha-2020-8\">Blake was shot in the back seven times by an officer</a> while standing in the driver's door of a car with his children inside after police had initially responded to a domestic dispute.</p><p>Blake was hospitalized after the incident, and his family and <a href=\"https://www.insider.com/picture-details-jacob-blake-black-man-shot-by-police-kenosha-2020-8\">attorney have since confirmed he is paralyzed</a>.</p><p>The protests in Kenosha coincided with the <a href=\"https://www.cbsnews.com/video/trump-touts-law-and-order-message-in-rnc-acceptance-speech/\">Republican National Convention, where Trump and his allies</a> repeatedly <a href=\"https://twitter.com/realDonaldTrump/status/1300041598449917953\">touted a \"law and order\" vision for the country</a>. Speeches at the convention often bashed protesters in Portland, Oregon, where demonstrations that began as peaceful gatherings against police brutality in the wake of George Floyd's death descended into violent clashes with National Guard agents deployed to the city by Trump's administration.</p><p><a href=\"https://apnews.com/70e589c5c17c05ec6bf1b75ca8ce7592\">The Associated Press reported</a> that the visit is sure to \"exacerbate tensions\" in Kenosha, <a href=\"https://www.reuters.com/article/us-global-race-usa/anti-racism-protesters-to-march-in-kenosha-watched-by-national-guard-reinforcements-idUSKBN25P0K9?il=0\">where more than 1,000 National Guard soldiers were </a>on the ground, Reuters reported.</p><p>Democratic Rep. Karen Bass echoed that concern of tensions on CNN's \"State of the Union\" Sunday, where she said Trump's trip has \"one purpose and one purpose only, and that is to agitate things and to make things worse.\"</p><blockquote class=\"twitter-tweet blockquote\" data-lang=\"en\" data-cards=\"\" data-conversation=\"\">&#8212;State of the Union  (@CNNSotu) <a href=\"https://twitter.com/mims/statuses/1300070801115353088?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw\">August 30, 2020</a></blockquote><script async src=\"//platform.twitter.com/widgets.js\" charset=\"utf-8\"></script><p>Earlier in the week, Wisconsin Gov. Tony Evers had declared a state of emergency on Tuesday and implemented an 8 p.m. local time curfew.</p><p>Two Kenosha police officers have been placed on administrative leave in the wake of the shooting, which <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/doj-jacob-blake-shooting-civil-rights-investigation-2020-8\">is currently being investigated</a> by the Wisconsin Justice Department's criminal division in coordination with the Federal Bureau of Investigation.&#160;</p><div class=\"read-original\">Read the original article on <a 0326},{"createdTime":"2020-08-31 14:00:50","updatedTime":"2020-08-31 14:00:50","title":"Bollinger Motors just revealed a super sleek all-electric delivery van concept — take a look at the Deliver-e.","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/electric-delivery-van-concept-bollinger-motors-deliver-e-info-pics-2020-8","description":"<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f47e825db1ed000297144f6?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Bollinger Motors DELIVER E Front 3.4 to Scale\" height=\"1406\" width=\"2500\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Bollinger Motors Deliver-e.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Bollinger Motors</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><ul class=\"summary-list\"><li>The Deliver-e is Bollinger Motors's latest all-electric delivery van concept.</li><li>Bollinger Motors is the company behind the all-electric and Tesla Cybertruck-challenging B1 and B2.&#160;</li><li>The Deliver-e is still just a concept for now, but CEO Robert Bollinger told Business Insider that the company has \"accepted custom specs from several prospective customers.\"</li><li><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/?hprecirc-bullet\">Visit Business Insider's homepage for more stories</a>.</li></ul><p>The future of package delivery might soon become whisper-silent and all-electric.</p><p>Bollinger Motors, the company behind the Tesla Cybertruck-challenging, <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/bollinger-motors-unveiled-125000-fully-electric-suv-pickup-truck-2019-10\">all-electric and all-wheel drive B1 sport-utility truck and B2 pickup truck</a>, unveiled the Deliver-e delivery van concept on Thursday. Like the B1 and B2, the Deliver-e also exclusively runs on battery-electric power.&#160;</p><p>The Deliver-e uses a front-wheel-drive platform. Bollinger Motors has plans to engineer it to meet Class 2B, 3, 4, and 5 truck classifications. The company says that the total cost of ownership for each class is \"significantly lower than gas and diesel versions on the road today,\" according to an emailed press release.</p><p>The Deliver-e concept follows <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/amazon-creating-fleet-of-electric-delivery-vehicles-rivian-2020-2\">Amazon's announcement in February</a> that it had ordered 100,000 custom delivery vehicles from Rivian, another EV startup. Additionally, <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/amazon-adds-1800-mercedes-benz-electric-vans-to-european-fleet-2020-8\">Business Insider reported on Friday</a> that Amazon has also just ordered 1,800 electric delivery vans from Mercedes-Benz for European deliveries.</p><p>All-electric delivery vehicles are a nice idea. They would cut down on neighborhood noise and pollution levels if successfully implemented.</p><p>Keep reading to learn more about the Deliver-e concept.</p>\n<div id=\"slideshow\">\n\tThe Deliver-e is an all-electric delivery van concept from Bollinger Motors, the company responsible for the Cybertruck-challenging B1 and B2.\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f47e824cd2fec00296a4982?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Bollinger Motors DELIVER E Aerial View\" height=\"1406\" width=\"2500\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Bollinger Motors Deliver-e.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Bollinger Motors</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t\n\tThe Deliver-e will be front-wheel drive and designed to meet Class 2B, 3, 4, and 5 truck classifications.\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f47e825db1ed000297144f6?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Bollinger Motors DELIVER E Front 3.4 to Scale\" height=\"1406\" width=\"2500\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Bollinger Motors Deliver-e.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Bollinger Motors</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t\n\tBollinger says 70, 105, 140, 175, and 210 kWh battery packs will be available, as well as variable lengths in the wheelbase.\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f47e825cd2fec00296a4984?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Bollinger Motors DELIVER E Front 3.4\" height=\"1406\" width=\"2500\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Bollinger Motors Deliver-e.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Bollinger Motors</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t\n\tWith a floor height of 18 inches, loading cargo in the Deliver-e should be a breeze.\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f47e825cd2fec00296a4985?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Bollinger Motors DELIVER E Rear 3.4 Open\" height=\"1406\" width=\"2500\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Bollinger Motors Deliver-e.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Bollinger Motors</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t\n\tThe production version of the delivery van will have a high-strength steel frame with a 10-year durability target.\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f47e825cd2fec00296a4986?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Bollinger Motors DELIVER E Front\" height=\"1406\" width=\"2500\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Bollinger Motors Deliver-e.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Bollinger Motors</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t\n\tCEO Robert Bollinger told Business Insider, “We’ve already accepted custom specs from several prospective customers, and are in the process of developing proposals for how the Deliver-e can be built to their needs.”\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f47e825cd2fec00296a4983?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Bollinger Motors DELIVER E Rear 3.4 Closed\" height=\"1406\" width=\"2500\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Bollinger Motors Deliver-e.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Bollinger Motors</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t\n\tBollinger says it’s working with a manufacturing partner to build the Deliver-e in the US.\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f47e825db1ed000297144f5?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Bollinger Motors DELIVER E Rear Closed\" height=\"1406\" width=\"2500\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Bollinger Motors Deliver-e.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Bollinger Motors</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t\n\tDeliver-e production is scheduled for 2022. No pricing was announced at this time.\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f47e825cd2fec00296a4987?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Bollinger Motors DELIVER E Side\" height=\"1406\" width=\"2500\"
